name: Luminoso
description: Luminoso is a puzzle game with laser beams. The goal of each puzzle is to make all laser beams hit the receiver pieces of their respective color.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista 32-bit/64-bit or newer Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: A great puzzle game wich is interesting and fun. Do not listen to others.
